title.narrative: Girls' Education Challenge - Programme management costs

description.narrative: This activity (Girls' Education Challenge - Programme management costs) is a component of Girls' Education Challenge (GEC) - help 1 million disadvantaged girls go to primary and secondary school reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £39,097,000. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Primary education, Basic life skills for youth and adults, Secondary education. , with the following implementing partners: PwC. The start date is 19-09-2011 and the end date is 30-09-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults
